mapper.select: select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema = #{baseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select COLUMN_NAME as column_name from information_schema.COLUMNS where table_name = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TABLE_SCHEMA = #{baseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from ht_sort_node where pId = #{id}
mapper.update: update ht_sort_node set pId = #{pid} ,name = #{name}, url = #{url},nodeId = #{nodeId},attributes = #{attributes} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ht_sort_node(pId,name,url,nodeId,attributes) values (#{pid},#{name},#{url},#{nodeId},#{attributes})
mapper.select: select * from ht_sort_node where nodeId = #{nodeId} AND pId = 0
select * from ht_listone where is_delete=0 and page_id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ht_listone (page_id,type,title,value,name,style, datasource,pagesize,datapic,datatitle, datacontent,colnumber,bottomline,showpage,orderby,tpl,titlesize,consize,listpich,listpicw,url,titlelabel,conlabel,frmedit,frmdel,fontsize,searchcon,seardelval,listheight,picfontsize,isnotuser,prefix,isheader,headertitle,moreurl,headercolor,titlecolor,iscomment,outborder,prefixcolor,headstyle,headimgsrc,pagingstyle,isscore,onlyshowone,multisource,multititles, multinodeids, multisourcenames, multidatapics, multidatatitles,multidatacontents,multititlesizes, multiconsizes, multititlelabels, multiconlabels, multifontsizes, multilistpicws, multilistpichs,multilisturls, multisearchcons, multiseardelvals, multipicfontsizes, multilistheights,multirowsourcecount,multisourcepublic,iscolor,datacontent2,typesevendate,typesevenurl) VALUES (#{page_id},#{type},#{title},#{value},#{name},#{style},#{datasource},#{pagesize},#{datapic},#{datatitle},#{datacontent},#{colnumber},#{bottomline},#{showpage},#{orderby},#{tpl}, #{titlesize},#{consize},#{listpich},#{listpicw},#{url},#{titlelabel},#{conlabel}, #{frmedit},#{frmdel},#{fontsize},#{searchcon},#{seardelval},#{listheight},#{picfontsize}, #{isnotuser},#{prefix},#{isheader},#{headertitle},#{moreurl},#{headercolor},#{titlecolor}, #{iscomment},#{outborder},#{prefixcolor},#{headstyle},#{headimgsrc},#{pagingstyle}, #{isscore},#{onlyshowone},#{multisource},#{multititles},#{multinodeids},#{multisourcenames},#{multidatapics}, #{multidatatitles},#{multidatacontents},#{multititlesizes},#{multiconsizes}, #{multititlelabels},#{multiconlabels},#{multifontsizes},#{multilistpicws}, #{multilistpichs},#{multilisturls},#{multisearchcons},#{multiseardelvals}, #{multipicfontsizes},#{multilistheights},#{multirowsourcecount},#{multisourcepublic},#{iscolor},#{datacontent2},#{typesevendate},#{typesevenurl});
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

mapper.update: drop table IF EXISTS ${tableName}; CREATE TABLE ${tableName} ( id int(8) PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, version int(8) DEFAULT 0, is_delete tinyint(1) DEFAULT 0, ${fieldsStr} create_time datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', gid int(8) COMMENT '关联的记录id', assignee varchar(100) COMMENT '处理人', taskid varchar(100) COMMENT '任务id', processinsid varchar(100) COMMENT '流程实例id', processdefid varchar(100) COMMENT '流程定义id', userid varchar(100) COMMENT '发起人用户id', other varchar(100) COMMENT '保留字段', deploymentid varchar(100) COMMENT '流程部署id', username varchar(100) COMMENT '用户名', update_time datetime COMMENT '更新时间' )ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
mapper.select: select table_name from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where table_name =#{tableName} and TABLE_SCHEMA='hbsxt';

select * from
where node_id = #{node_id} and is_delete=0

select * from
where id = #{id} and is_delete=0

select * from
where node_id = #{id} and is_delete=0

select * from
mapper.update:
update
set is_delete = 0
set is_delete =1
node_id = #{node_id}

update ht_pageEditor
node_id = #{node_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
node_name = #{node_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{is_delete,jdbcType=BIT},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}+1,
fields = #{fields,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parse = #{parse,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
selected = #{selected,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
phone_parse = #{phoneParse,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
shareTo_name = #{shareTo_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shareTo_nodeId = #{shareTo_nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
id = #{id}
mapper.select: select eq_field,eq_name,is_sort from ht_course_eq
mapper.insert: INSERT into ht_sort_search(name,data_source) VALUES(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id,name,parent_id from ht_cascade_classify where id = #{rootId}
select id,name,parent_id as parentId from ht_cascade_classify where parent_id=#{rootId}
mapper.insert: insert into ht_cascade_classify(id,name,parent_id,jobId,roleId) values(#{id},#{name},#{parentId},#{jobId},#{roleId})
mapper.select: select DISTINCT COLUMN_NAME,column_comment from information_schema.COLUMNS where table_name = #{tableName}
select DISTINCT COLUMN_NAME from information_schema.COLUMNS where table_name = #{tableName}
select uid,wxopenid as openid,chinese_name as nickname from ht_user where uid = #{uId}

select u.uid,u.wxopenid as openid,u.chinese_name as nickname from ht_user u left join ht_role_user g select u.uid,u.wxopenid as openid,u.chinese_name as nickname from ht_user u left join ht_role_user g on g.uid = u.uId where role_id = #{groupId}
select id,name,parent_id as parentId from ht_cascade_classify select id,name,parent_id as parentId from ht_cascade_classify
SELECT DISTINCT(id),parent_id,`name`,jobId,roleId from ht_cascade_classify where jobId in (select role_id from ht_role_user where uid =#{uId}) and parent_id = 0
select pid,id from ht_role where id >= #{roleId}

SELECT pu.user_id from ht_position_user pu LEFT JOIN ht_role_position rp on rp.id = pu.pos_id LEFT JOIN ht_role r on r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN ht_user u on u.uid = pu.user_id where r.id in
#{item}

SELECT user_id FROM ht_position_user where pos_id in
#{item}

select uid,mobile from ht_user where mobile is not null and uid in
#{item}
select ${datafield} from ${node_name}
select * from ${node_name} where id=${selectId}

select distinct node_name from ht_pageEditor where node_id in (select id from ht_node where parent_id in (select id from ht_node where parent_id=#{node_id})) or node_id in (select id from ht_node where parent_id=#{node_id}) or node_id in (select id from ht_node where parent_id in (select id from ht_node where parent_id in (select id from ht_node where parent_id=#{node_id})))
